languages.text: {n}Пленник выжидающе смотрит на вас, не переставая жевать. Но что-то неуловимо меняется в его лице, будто на смену напускной простоте и грубости приходят сосредоточенность и коварство.{/n}
{n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Пленник выжидающе смотрит на вас, не переставая жевать. Но что-то неуловимо меняется в его лице, будто на смену напускной простоте и грубости приходят сосредоточенность и коварство.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

traits.locale_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}这个囚犯带着期盼的目光看着你。尽管他的咀嚼并没有停止，但他的表情却发生了微妙的变化，原本粗野的举止中露出了一丝专注与狡猾。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这个囚犯带着期盼的目光看着你。尽管他的咀嚼并没有停止，但他的表情却发生了微妙的变化，原本粗野的举止中露出了一丝专注与狡猾。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}囚人は咀嚼を止めることなく、期待に満ちた眼差しでこちらを見ている。しかし、それまでの粗野な態度から、集中力と狡猾さに満ちた表情へとかすかに変わった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人は咀嚼を止めることなく、期待に満ちた眼差しでこちらを見ている。しかし、それまでの粗野な態度から、集中力と狡猾さに満ちた表情へとかすかに変わった。{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}El prisionero te mira con expectación sin dejar de masticar. Sin embargo, su expresión cambia sutilmente, como si el primitivismo que afecta fuera sustituido por concentración e ingenio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El prisionero te mira con expectación sin dejar de masticar. Sin embargo, su expresión cambia sutilmente, como si el primitivismo que afecta fuera sustituido por concentración e ingenio.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Le prisonnier vous regarde sans cesser de mastiquer, mais vous remarquez une légère altération dans les traits de son visage, comme si la ruse et la concentration venaient de remplacer le détachement qu'il avait feint jusque-là.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le prisonnier vous regarde sans cesser de mastiquer, mais vous remarquez une légère altération dans les traits de son visage, comme si la ruse et la concentration venaient de remplacer le détachement qu'il avait feint jusque-là.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Der Gefangene sieht dich erwartungsvoll an, ohne sein Kauen zu unterbrechen. Aber sein Ausdruck hat sich subtil verändert, aus ungeschliffenem Geist und Verhalten wurden Konzentration und Gerissenheit.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Gefangene sieht dich erwartungsvoll an, ohne sein Kauen zu unterbrechen. Aber sein Ausdruck hat sich subtil verändert, aus ungeschliffenem Geist und Verhalten wurden Konzentration und Gerissenheit.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison

languages.text: {n}Mahkûm, çiğnemeye devam ederek beklenti içinde sana bakıyor. İfadesiyse zihniyle tavırlarına hâkim olan kabalığın yerini odaklanma ve kurnazlık almışçasına, sinsice değişiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The prisoner looks at you expectantly without stopping his chewing. But his expression shifts subtly, as if his affected crudeness of mind and manner has been replaced by focus and cunning.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Mahkûm, çiğnemeye devam ederek beklenti içinde sana bakıyor. Ancak ifadesi, zihniyle tavırlarına hâkim olan kabalığın yerini odaklanma ve kurnazlık almışçasına, sinsice değişiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: UlfarInPrison
